TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TableCell extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl

summary.span: 表示 控件中的单元格。

span.span: Represents a cell in a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主题内容：In this topic: - [介绍Introduction](#introduction) - [声明性语法Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## 介绍Introduction 类表示中的单元格控件。The class represents a cell in a control. 你可以使用属性指定或确定单元格的内容。You can use the property to specify or determine the contents of the cell. 类，可以控制如何显示单元格的内容。The class allows you to control how the contents of the cell are displayed. 中的单元格内容的对齐方式通过将设置指定和属性。The alignment of the contents in the cell are specified by setting the and properties. 你可以使用属性指定的单元格中单元格的内容是否换行。You can use the property to specify whether the contents of the cell wrap in the cell. 你还可以指定所代表的表格中的多少行或列控件中，由一个单元格都被占用。You can also specify how many rows or columns in the table, represented by a control, are occupied by an individual cell. 和属性控制多少行并使用列，分别。The and properties control how many rows and columns are used, respectively. > [!CAUTION] > 此控件可用来显示用户输入，这可能包含恶意客户端脚本。This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script. 检查从客户端可执行的脚本、 SQL 语句或其他代码之前发送在你的应用程序中显示它的任何信息。Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application. ASP.NET 提供的一输入的请求验证功能块脚本和 HTML 在用户输入。ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input. 验证服务器控件还提供用于评估用户输入。Validation server controls are also provided to assess user input. 有关详细信息，请参阅[保护标准控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8)，[如何： 保护对脚本利用在 Web 应用程序中进行应用 HTML 编码为字符串](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b)，和[中验证用户输入ASP.NET Web Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461)。For more information, see [Securing Standard Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8), [How to: Protect Against Script Exploits in a Web Application by Applying HTML Encoding to Strings](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b), and [Validating User Input in ASP.NET Web Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461). ## 声明性语法Declarative Syntax ``` ``` ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建表、 以编程方式，将元素添加到表并在网页上显示的表。The following code example demonstrates how to create a table, add elements to the table programmatically, and display the table on the Web page. 请注意如何实例化控件并设置其属性值。Note how controls are instantiated and their property values are set. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，并可能无法正常工作如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空白文本文件。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). [!code-aspx-csharp[TableCell#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TableCell/CS/tablecellcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TableCell#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TableCell/VB/tablecellvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 将特定于 控件的属性添加到要呈现的特性列表中。

span.span: Adds properties specific to the control to the list of attributes to render.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法重写基类的方法，它首先调用基方法，然后添加属性对应于属性，属性和属性。The method overrides the base class's method and first calls the base method and then adds the attributes corresponding to the property, the property and the property. 如果属性是指未可以找到引发。If the property refers to a that can not be found, an is thrown. 主要由控件开发人员扩展功能的使用方法控件。The method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写方法中的自定义的服务器控件，以便为每个单元格呈现的自定义的 title 属性。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method in a custom server control so that a custom title attribute is rendered for each cell. [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomTableCellAddAttributesToRender#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomTableCellAddAttributesToRender/CS/custom_tablecell_addattributestorendercs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomTableCellAddAttributesToRender#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomTableCellAddAttributesToRender/VB/custom_tablecell_addattributestorendervb.aspx#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomTableCellAddAttributesToRender#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomTableCellAddAttributesToRender/CS/custom_tablecell_addattributestorender.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CustomTableCellAddAttributesToRender#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomTableCellAddAttributesToRender/VB/custom_tablecell_addattributestorender.vb#2)]

exception.span: 未找到列为关联标题单元格的单元格。

span.span: A cell listed as an associated header cell was not found.

para.span: 在重写方法在派生类中，一定要调用基本类的方法，以便正确呈现控件特性。

span.span: When overriding the method in a derived class, be sure to call the method of the base class so that the control attributes are properly rendered.

summary.span: 将已分析的子控件添加到 控件。

span.span: Adds a parsed child control to the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果控件包含子控件然后基类的方法是调用; 否则为控件的属性值添加为对象传递给控件.If the control contains child controls then the base class's method is called; otherwise, the control's property value is added as a object to the control's . 主要由控件开发人员扩展功能的使用方法控件。The method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the control.

para.span: 在重写方法在派生类中，一定要调用基类的方法，以便对象正确添加到控件。

span.span: When overriding the method in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that objects are properly added to the control .

summary.span: 获取或设置一个由空格分隔的列表，该列表包含与 控件关联的表标题单元格。

span.span: Gets or sets a space-separated list of table header cells associated with the control.

value.span: 字符串数组，包含关联表标题单元格的标识符。

span.span: An array of strings containing the identifiers of the associated table header cells.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含的标头单元格编程标识符的列表提供的标头信息控件。The property contains a list of header cell programmatic identifiers that provide header information of the control. 标头单元格标识符列表以逗号分隔列表的形式呈现到 HTML``元素的`header`属性。The list of header cell identifiers is rendered as a comma delimited list into the HTML `` element's `header` attribute. 设置时属性使用逗号分隔列表的字符串。When setting the property use a comma delimited list of strings. 如果列表的元素不被识别为有效的表标题单元格时，将引发调用。If an element of the list is not recognized as a valid table header cell an is thrown when the is invoked. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以声明方式指定属性控件。The following code example demonstrates how to declaratively specify the property of a control. 具体而言，请注意中的最后一行的单元格是关联到三个标头单元格。In particular, note how the cell in the last row is associated to three header cells. 有关完整的工作代码示例，请参阅类概述主题。For a complete, working code example, see the class overview topic. ```csharp (2,0) ``` ```vb (2,0) ```

summary.span: 获取或设置 控件中单元格跨越的列数。

span.span: Gets or sets the number of columns in the control that the cell spans.

value.span: 呈现的表中单元格跨越的列数。

span.span: The number of columns in the rendered table that the cell spans.

value.span: 默认值为 ，表示未设置此属性。

span.span: The default value is , which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定或确定呈现的单元格跨越的表中的列数。Use the property to specify or determine the number of columns in the rendered table that the cell spans. 例如，如果将此属性设置为`2`，单元格占用两个列控件。For example, if you set this property to `2`, the cell takes up two columns in the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以声明方式指定的控件。The following code example demonstrates how to declaratively specify the of a control. 具体而言，请注意最后一个行的单个单元格如何跨越三列。In particular, note how the last row's single cell spans three columns. 有关完整的工作代码示例，请参阅类概述主题。For a complete, working code example, see the class overview topic. ```csharp (2,0) ``` ```vb (2,0) ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果控件具有子控件或中重写派生类的基类方法是调用; 否则为的值属性写入对象。If the control has child controls or is overridden in a derived class the base class's method is called; otherwise, the value of the property is written to the object. 主要由控件开发人员扩展功能的使用方法控件。The method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写在自定义的方法控制的它在单元格的内容中插入自定义文本。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method in a custom control so that it custom text is inserted in the cell's contents. span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the control should set the attribute of the rendered HTML element to "disabled" when the control's property is .

value.span: 如果属性指示 ASP.NET 版本低于4.0; 否则为。

span.span: if the property indicates an ASP.NET version lower than 4.0; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性指示 ASP.NET 应的呈现方式 HTML 控件时控件被禁用。This property indicates how ASP.NET should render HTML for a control when the control is disabled. 如果此属性为`true`，ASP.NET 呈现`disabled`属性时控件被禁用。If this property is `true`, ASP.NET renders a `disabled` attribute when a control is disabled. 如果此属性为`false`，ASP.NET 呈现`class`属性时控件被禁用。If this property is `false`, ASP.NET renders a `class` attribute when a control is disabled. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see .

The text contents of the cell.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定或确定该单元格的文本内容。Use the property to specify or determine the text contents of the cell. 此属性通常用于以编程方式更新单元格的内容。This property is commonly used to programmatically update the contents of a cell. > [!NOTE] > 设置属性将清除中包含的任何其他控件。Setting the property will clear any other controls contained in the . > [!CAUTION] > 控件可以用于显示用户输入，这可能包含恶意客户端脚本。The control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script. 检查从客户端可执行的脚本、 SQL 语句或其他代码之前发送在你的应用程序中显示它的任何信息。Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application. ASP.NET 提供的一输入的请求验证功能块脚本和 HTML 在用户输入。ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input. 验证服务器控件还提供用于评估用户输入。Validation server controls are also provided to assess user input. 有关详细信息，请参阅[保护标准控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8)，[如何： 保护对脚本利用在 Web 应用程序中进行应用 HTML 编码为字符串](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b)，和[中验证用户输入ASP.NET Web Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461)。For more information, see [Securing Standard Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8), [How to: Protect Against Script Exploits in a Web Application by Applying HTML Encoding to Strings](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b), and [Validating User Input in ASP.NET Web Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461). 此属性的值设置时，可以自动保存到的资源文件通过使用设计器工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅和[全球化和本地化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建的新实例以编程方式控制。The following code example demonstrates how to create a new instance of a control programmatically. 具体而言，请注意如何属性用来设置的内容控件。In particular, note how the property is used for setting the contents of the control. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定或确定是否单元格的内容换行的单元格中。Use the property to specify or determine whether the content of the cell wrap in the cell.
